post_title: FS T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 2
post_content:
FOR SALE: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 2 $9000

This beautiful iconic Cobb Green Portrait has become available for sale! The nicest PSA 2 you will EVER see! Amazing color, amazing registration, and appropriate centering.

Price is net to me (Venmo), or $9,300 PP G&S
DM if interested. 

*Cross-posted*
I usually refrain from making comments that don't involve the purchase of an item in the BST section but that is a great looking Cobb Brian.

[quote name="Pat R" post=2400551]I usually refrain from making comments that don't involve the purchase of an item in the BST section but that is a great looking Cobb Brian.[/QUOTE]

I appreciate that Pat. It's a beauty for sure!
